replies.body: yes punish people more for leaving champion select because of troll picks/players, that should be a good solution /s

Because letting people dodge, and letting those trolls go unpunished is such a great system.

/s
Not sure what ranked ladder you're playing on but I don't ever have that issue...at most I'll get two dodges in a row and then we're fine.  Lol more complaining just to complain
Exactly this. OP probably had to go through two dodges at most and is salty that he had to waste 2 whole minutes of his life.
